about.title: About Us / About Invest Union
about.text: We are the only manufacturer in Ukraine producing three-layer furniture panels from reclaimed oak and coniferous species that meet European standards. Our mission is to transform reclaimed wood into durable solutions for unique interiors. We combine the centuries-old history of wood with modern technologies to create materials that inspire architects, designers, and furniture makers. Each panel is not just a structural element but a part of the aesthetics that conveys the character of the space. Selection of raw materials, drying, gluing, and finishing — everything is under our control to ensure stability, sustainability, and a flawless appearance. We don’t just produce wood — we create the foundation for ideas that live for decades.

eco.title: Eco-friendliness
eco.text: We work exclusively with reclaimed wood, preserving natural resources and reducing environmental impact.

quality.title: Quality and Durability
quality.text: Our panels undergo multi-stage processing, ensuring shape stability and long-lasting aesthetics.

recycling.title: Recycling
recycling.text: We give new life to century-old wood, combining authenticity with modern technologies.

international.title: International Experience
international.text: Our solutions are already used by designers and architects across Europe.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
list: We chose Invest Union for their attention to detail and the true authenticity of the material. Reclaimed oak panels became the key element of our interior.
We were looking for a material that would combine authenticity and stability — and we found it in Invest Union panels. Their texture adds depth to the space, and the quality leaves no doubt.
Reclaimed oak panels turned out to be a real discovery for our project. Clients immediately notice the wood’s texture — it speaks for itself. Working with such material is pure pleasure.

items.question: What is the thickness of the three-layer panel?
items.answer: The standard thickness is 20 mm, but custom orders are possible.

items.question: What types of wood do you use for panels?
items.answer: We work with reclaimed oak as well as coniferous species, particularly pine and fir. All wood undergoes careful selection and drying.

items.question: Can I order panels of non-standard size?
items.answer: Yes, we manufacture panels according to individual dimensions specified by the client.

items.question: Are your panels suitable for flooring?
items.answer: Our panels are intended for furniture production and wall finishing, as well as flooring. For floors, we recommend specialized solutions.

items.question: Can I see samples before ordering?
items.answer: Of course. We provide wood samples so you can evaluate texture, color, and quality before making a decision.

history.title: Our History
history.text:
It all began with the idea of giving new life to wood that had already lived for centuries. We saw beauty in barn boards that preserved traces of time and decided to turn them into something more than just material — into the foundation for unique interiors.

From a small workshop, we grew into a production facility that today is the only one in Ukraine manufacturing three-layer furniture panels from reclaimed oak and coniferous species. We combined craftsmanship with technology to create stable, ecological, and aesthetically refined solutions for designers, architects, and furniture makers.

Every panel is the result of careful selection, drying, gluing, and finishing. We don’t just work with wood — we preserve its history so it can live on in new spaces.

honesty.title: Honesty and Transparency
honesty.text: We are open in everything — from the origin of the wood to the terms of cooperation. Transparency in processes and honesty in communication are the foundation of our reputation.

development.title: Continuous Development
development.text: We constantly improve our technologies, expand our product range, and learn every day. Our production is not a static system but a living organism that grows together with market demands.

openness.title: Openness to Innovation
openness.text: We are not afraid of experiments. New formats, unconventional requests, and customized solutions are challenges we embrace with enthusiasm.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.text: We take responsibility for the quality of every panel, for the ecological sustainability of our processes, and for keeping our commitments. Reliability is not just a word — it is our principle of work.

clients.title: Clients Are Partners
clients.text: We don’t just supply material — we collaborate. Every client is a partner with whom we create long-term solutions that carry value and meaning.
